tool_description: Global search and recommendation APIs for movies, series and TV shows.
name: Movies Vista
title: Movies Vista

api_list.name: idlookup
api_list.description:
Find out where to watch a movie or TV show by looking it up using common IDs (IMDb, tmdb, Wiki, etc).

For example (L'affaire Dubuffet):
IMDb, tt0331162

api_list.name: lookup
api_list.description: Find a TV show or movie by name and check its availability through supported services for a specific country || Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, Amazon Instant Video, Apple TV +, Google Play, iTunes, YouTube Premium, Disney Plus, Hulu, Atom Tickets, CBS, DC Universe, HBO.
